    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       American Ethnic Diversity &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/americanethnicdiversity
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox17118556">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17118556">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17118556">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources for Facilitating Your Experience
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17118556">
          <p>
           <strong>
            GENERATING TEACHING METHODS IDEAS
           </strong>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            Websites:
           </p>
           <ul>
            <li>
             American Sociological Association: Instructor's Manual for Unit VI, Social Inequalities
             <br />
             <a href="http://www.asanet.org/introtosociology/teacherresources/IMForUnitVI.html">
              http://www.asanet.org/introtosociology/teacherresources/IMForUnitVI.html
             </a>
             <br />
             See Resources for Students and Resources for Teachers links at the top.
             <br />
             <br />
            </li>
            <li>
             What's Race
             <br />
             <a href="http://www.whatsrace.org/pages/games.html">
              http://www.whatsrace.org/pages/games.html
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            Library Databases:
           </p>
           <ul>
            <li>
             <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=eric">
              ERIC
             </a>
             <span style="float: right; padding-left: 2px;">
             </span>
             <br />
             Premier database of scholarly and professional journals, books, documents, and more in education and related areas. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the
             <strong>
              Check for Full Text
             </strong>
             &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
             <br />
             <br />
            </li>
            <li>
             <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socabs/advanced?accountid=40980">
              Sociological Abstracts
             </a>
             <br />
             Citations to scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, dissertations and more in sociology and related disciplines in the social and behavioral sciences. Use the
             <strong>
              Check for Full Text
             </strong>
             &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
            </li>
           </ul>
           <p>
            Sample Articles / Bibliographies:
           </p>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Coghlan, C. L., &amp; Huggins, D. W. (2004).
             <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://tso.sagepub.com/content/32/2/177.refs">
              &ldquo;That&rsquo;s Not Fair!&rdquo;: A Simulation Exercise in Social Stratification and Structural Inequality
             </a>
             .
             <em>
              Teaching Sociology, 32
             </em>
             (2), 177&ndash;187. doi:10.1177/0092055X0403200203
             <br />
             <br />
            </li>
            <li>
             Harlow, R. (2009).
             <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://tso.sagepub.com/content/37/2/194.refs">
              Innovations in Teaching Race and Class Inequality Bittersweet Candy and the Vanishing Dollar
             </a>
             .
             <em>
              Teaching Sociology, 37
             </em>
             (2), 194&ndash;204. doi:10.1177/0092055X0903700207
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <p>
           <b>
            FINDING MATERIALS TO USE IN FACILITATION
           </b>
          </p>
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aph">
             Academic Search Complete
            </a>
            -- Newspapers and Magazines
            <br />
            A database of both scholarly and popular publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas, including sociology. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic">
             LexisNexis Academic
            </a>
            -- Newspapers and Magazines
            <br />
            A database of popular newspapers, magazines, and broadcast transcripts, as well as business publications, legal materials, and more. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ofm">
             Omnifile
            </a>
            -- Newspapers and Magazines
            <br />
            A database of scholarly and non-scholarly journals covering various subjects including general sciences, humanities, social sciences, and business. Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu" target="_blank">
             Encompass Search
            </a>
            -- Movies, TV Shows, Literature, CDs, and more
            <br />
            Books, DVDs/VHS, CDs, and more at Trexler Library.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <blockquote>
           <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10719765">
           </div>
          </blockquote>
          <hr align="center" noshade="noshade" size="1" width="45%" />
          <p>
           <strong>
            GETTING THE ARTICLES IN LIBRARY DATABASES
           </strong>
          </p>
          <ul>
           <li>
            If you are in a library database with
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons, click on "
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            ." This button will take you the full text of the article or tell you that the full text cannot be found. If the full text is not available from Trexler Library, request it via
            <a title="Interlibrary Loan Home" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
             interlibrary loan
            </a>
            .
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            If you have citation information for the article (i.e., journal title, article title, publication year, etc.), type the information about your article in the
            <a title="Citation Help Page" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/atoztitles/search?#article">
             article finder
            </a>
            on the library website. If the library subscribes to the full text, you will be directed to the article. If not, you can request a copy of the article via
            <a title="Interlibrary Loan Home" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
             interlibrary loan
            </a>
            .
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            If Trexler Library does not have access to the full text of the article, search
            <a href="http://www.google.com/scholar">
             Google Scholar
            </a>
            by article title to see if the author has made a copy freely available online. Look to the far right of the article's title to see if there is a link to a freely available copy.&nbsp;
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt17118556" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17118557">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17118557">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17118557">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources for Sociological Scholarly Research
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17118557">
          <blockquote>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/">
             JSTOR
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journals for most academic disciplines, with many sociology journals. The most recent three to five years of most journals are not included. Full text is linked directly in the database.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://online.sagepub.com/cgi/search">
             SAGE Journals Online
            </a>
            <br />
            A database of scholarly journals published by Sage, providing wide coverage in all disciplines, but particularly the social sciences. Full text for articles published 1999 to the present is linked directly in the database; otherwise, search Encompass Search by journal titles to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
           <p>
            <a href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socabs/advanced?accountid=40980">
             Sociological Abstracts
            </a>
            <br />
            Citations to scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, dissertations and more in sociology and related disciplines in the social and behavioral sciences. Use the
            <strong>
             Check for Full Text
            </strong>
            &nbsp;buttons&nbsp;to check for full text online or in the library.
           </p>
          </blockquote>
          <div id="boxatt17118557" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox17118559">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="17118559">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title17118559">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Your Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content17118559">
          <ul>
           <li>
            For information on
            <strong>
             why to cite your sources
            </strong>
            and
            <strong>
             how to avoid plagiarism
            </strong>
            , see the
            <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=471100&amp;sid=3856388">
             Get Started with Library Research: Cite Sources
            </a>
            guide.&nbsp;
           </li>
          </ul>
          <ul>
           <li>
            For help using
            <strong>
             American Sociological Association Style
            </strong>
            , consult the following resources:
           </li>
          </ul>
          <blockquote>
           <ul>
            <li>
             ASA Style Guide (4th ed., 2010)
             <br />
             Location: Ready Reference 808.0663 A512a 2010
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <blockquote>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Formatting in Sociology: ASA Style (Purdue)
             <br />
             <a href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/583/03/">
              https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/583/03/
             </a>
             <br />
             <em>
              Note: See left sidebar for in-text citation information, as well.
              <br />
             </em>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <blockquote>
           <ul>
            <li>
             Quick Style Guide (American Sociological Association)
             <br />
             <a href="http://www.asanet.org/documents/teaching/pdfs/Quick_Tips_for_ASA_Style.pdf">
              http://www.asanet.org/documents/teaching/pdfs/Quick_Tips_for_ASA_Style.pdf
             </a>
            </li>
           </ul>
          </blockquote>
          <ul>
           <li>
            <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
             Zotero
             <br />
            </a>
            "Free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research sources." Download instructions and help available on the site.
           </li>
          </ul>
          <div id="boxatt17118559" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4652607" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox18458059">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="18458059">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title18458059">
